author: CTPPS
body:
Changes to include raw-to-digi code for the diamond detectors of CTPPS.

 * Built on top of #16010 .
 * Added `CTPPSDiamondDigi` class.
 * Added XML files with "cabling" mapping for diamonds.
 * "Cabling" mapping stored in EventSetup separately for each CTPPS subdetector.
 * Added `RawToDigiConverter::Run` for diamonds.
 * Added `ctppsRawToDigi` sequence to include all CTPPS modules with proper configuration.
 * Updated `EventContent` to include also the diamond products.
 * Added event counter to the `TotemVFATStatus` for DQM and debugging.

Below, a summary of tests performed.

llvm-analyzer: no warnings in CTPPS code.

CTPPS configs:
 * EventFilter/CTPPSRawToDigi/test/test_standard_sequence_cfg.py
 * RecoCTPPS/Configuration/test/raw_data_test.py
 * DQM/CTPPS/test/dqm_test_cfg.py

Si strip reconstruction (local tracks), one reference run
 * identical before and after: http://jkaspar.web.cern.ch/jkaspar/share/github/cmp.pdf

Global CMSSW configs:
 * DQM/Integration/python/clients/ctpps_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py
 * Configuration/StandardSequences/python/RawToDigi_cff.py
   * tested to include the right CTPPS modules given the Run2_2016 era
 * Configuration/StandardSequences/python/Reconstruction_cff.py
   * tested to include the right CTPPS modules given the Run2_2016 era

Matrix test
 * `runTheMatrix.py -l limited` yielded:
   * 14 14 13 11 7 1 1 1 tests passed, 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed
title: CTPPS: raw-to-digi for diamond detectors
